thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 16 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-De Beers Says Progressing Development of Blockchain Technology Initiative

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-De Beers Says Progressing Development of Blockchain Technology Initiative

organizations.name: brief-de beers says progressing development of blockchain technology initiative

text:
Jan 16 (Reuters) - De Beers Group:
* PROGRESSES DEVELOPMENT OF FIRST BLOCKCHAIN INITIATIVE TO SPAN THE DIAMOND VALUE CHAIN
* ANTICIPATES THAT BLOCKCHAIN WILL OPERATE AS AN OPEN PLATFORM
* FOLLOWING SUCCESS OF INITIAL PROOF OF CONCEPT TRIAL, A PILOT IS NOW UNDERWAY INVOLVING A SMALL NUMBER OF PARTICIPANTS Further company coverage:
